data.title: Shakira and Gerad Pique Expecting Their First Baby *Update* Gave Birth to a Boy
data.meta_description:
Shakira confirmed on her Facebook/Twitter that she is expecting her first child with soccer star Gerard Pique.

Congratulations to the...

Shakira confirmed on her Facebook/Twitter that she is expecting her first child with soccer star Gerard Pique.

Shakira's FB

Congratulations to the couple, I expect it to be one gorgeous and talented baby with such parents.
